page.title: 17FAVOURITE FOODS.S.HEDINGHAM
page.content: We have found that most children prefer a certain range of{food.}This is a typical selection of{food} consumed on a weekday. {BREAKFAST}= Cereals with milk:Weetabix or Rice Krispies. {LUNCH}= Sandwiches with various fillings,Crisps,Biscuits,Cake,Yoghurt or Fruit. {DINNER}/Main Course = Chips,Beefburger and Baked Beans.Sausage and Mashed Potatoes.Fish,Chips and Peas.Sausage Rolls.Beef and Vegetables. Desserts = Angel Delight,Chocolate Cake,Steamed Puddings,Ice Cream,Apple Pie,Custard. {SNACKS}= Biscuits,Fruit or Crisps. {DRINKS}= Tea,Orange Squash,Milk.Water, Fruit Juice,Coffee or Fizzy. The majority of people have a Roast Dinner on Sunday.
